column2: Although the people of Faerûn honour many gods, you may choose to devote yourself to one of them in particular.
Although the people of Faerûn honour many gods, you may choose to devote yourself to one of them in particular.
Elikarashae, goddess of hunting and survival.
Relkath, god of forests and chaos.
Although the people of Faerûn honour many gods, you may choose to devote yourself to one of them in particular.
Zandilar, goddess of love, joy and tragedy.
